sentences.english: Resistant to blight, tolerate to re-plant and drought. Wide adaption.
sentences.chinese: 抗枯萎病能力強，耐重茬，耐旱，適應廣。

sentences.english: The boy from Guangdong was amazed at the white snow.
sentences.chinese: 廣東來的那個男孩看到白皚皚的雪很是驚訝。

sentences.english: Our program has a wide application, after repeated practice, it has well effects.
sentences.chinese: 其適用範圍廣，經多次應用實踐，效果良好。
廣分佈種類較少，僅佔種類總數的3%。

sentences.english: Best design of grooved drum, good yarn guide and generalized usage.
sentences.chinese: 最佳槽形設計，槽筒具有優良的導紗性能，適應性廣。

sentences.english: That transition will include Dynasty's popular '1992 dry red wine' where, according to Mr. He, the 1992 is a brand name rather than a vintage. 'We're getting rid of this,' he declares.
sentences.chinese: 這一過渡也包括廣受歡迎的1992乾紅葡萄酒。

sentences.english: To organize and administer the distribution and operation of advertisements.
sentences.chinese: 組織管理廣告發布與廣告經營活動。

sentences.english: Mr. Post asked, referring to the spicy grilled meat sandwich popular throughout the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 他指的是一種在中東地區廣受歡迎的辛辣烤肉三文治。

sentences.english: Minitype reservoir distributes area being a homogeneity earth dam broad, and many.
sentences.chinese: 小型水庫分佈區域廣，且多爲均質土壩。

sentences.english: A car is absolutely a necessity in canada because it's so sprawling.
sentences.chinese: 由於加拿大如此地廣，汽車絕對是必需品。

sentences.english: Strange Tales from a Lonely Studio by Pu Songling is a very popular collection of stories published in the early Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清初的《聊齋志異》是一部廣受歡迎的小說集。

sentences.english: Automatic marine generator control system covers a large field.
sentences.chinese: 船舶電站自動控制系統涉及面相當廣。

sentences.english: Modern Chinese two-syllable compound words many of the quantity, uses widely.
sentences.chinese: 現代漢語雙音節複合詞的數量多，用途廣。

sentences.english: Star bright sky and more, people widely wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 星多天空亮，人多智慧廣。

sentences.english: Coal mines are categorized as a high-risk industry which inevitably attract wide involvement and social attention.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦屬於高危行業，其涉及面廣，社會影響大。

sentences.english: It's known that the micro blog and friends circle are quite popular in China.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，微博和朋友圈在中國廣受歡迎。
